dataset_description: This dataset contains processed features extracted from videos of people performing gestures, aimed at studying gesture phase segmentation. The processed data includes velocity and acceleration measurements of hands and wrists during gesture performance. The goal is to classify different phases of gesture execution, which is important for gesture recognition and human-computer interaction applications.
dataset_source: University of SÃ£o Paulo, Brazil - Gesture recognition research

input_features.feature_description: Processed features including vectorial velocities (x,y,z coordinates) and accelerations for left and right hands and wrists. Features 1-12 are velocities, 13-24 are accelerations, and 25-32 are additional derived features.

description: This dataset contains processed features extracted from videos of people performing gestures, aimed at studying gesture phase segmentation. The processed data includes velocity and acceleration measurements of hands and wrists during gesture performance. The goal is to classify different phases of gesture execution, which is important for gesture recognition and human-computer interaction applications.
